name: Tipsy Ghost Hunter
description:
This game is for the Gamemakers Toolkit gamejam.

The theme was dual purpose design.

In this game you are a ghost hunter that drinks alchohol in order to fight off waves of ghosts. 

Everything serves at least two purposes. Shooting increases movement as well deal damage. Throwing your gun deals damage and gives you more options to shoot but impairs your movement. Drinking alcohol upgrades your stats but makes you more dunk making it harder to aim.
